description:
For expert civil trial representation, turn to me, attorney Robert A. Jones in Livingston. I am a certified Civil Trial Attorney by the Supreme Court of New Jersey. Fewer than 2 percent of lawyers in New Jersey obtain certification as trial lawyers.

I have received numerous additional honors, including selection for inclusion in New Jersey Super Lawyers from 2007 to 2014 and in 2016, as well as an AV rating* by Martindale-Hubbell. I am also a member of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum for my work in recovering million and multimillion-dollar settlements and verdicts for injury victims.

More Than 30 Years Of Protecting Clients’ Rights

My dedication to the law and to my clients’ needs sets my services apart. I fully commit my time and energy to each case, personally working with clients throughout the process. You can rely on my experience in cases involving:

  • Personal injury
  • Car accidents
  • Medical, professional and legal malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Business and employment law
  • Criminal defense

With experience as a prosecutor and a judge in the Livingston municipal court, I also know criminal and municipal cases from all sides.

A Law Firm You Can Count On

When you need a lawyer with a reputation as a skilled litigator and tireless worker, contact the Law Offices of Robert A. Jones in Essex County. We offer free consultations to discuss your case and learn how my staff and I can assist you.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Ratings™ fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
